title: Example: Exploring LoT in MLLM with Creative Humor Generation

definitions.Humor Generation: The process of creating humorous content

summary: The slide presents an example of exploring the Language of Thought in Multimodal Language Learning Models with a focus on creative humor generation. It compares two models, Qwen-VL and Qwen-VL+CLoT, and shows their outputs in image to text and text to text translation tasks. The slide also includes a source citation for the content.
